<p>The <code>manimlib/utils/tex_file_writing.py</code> file provides utilities for managing LaTeX file creation and rendering within the Manim library. It includes mechanisms for handling LaTeX compilation configurations, generating full LaTeX documents, and converting LaTeX code into SVG images for use in animations.</p>
<ul>
  <li><strong>LatexError</strong>: A custom exception class used to signal errors related to LaTeX processing.</li>
  <li><strong>get_tex_template_config</strong>: (not detailed here) Likely retrieves LaTeX template configurations based on a given template name.</li>
  <li><strong>get_tex_config</strong>: Returns the LaTeX compiler and preamble to be used for rendering, based on a specified or default template.</li>
  <li><strong>get_full_tex</strong>: (not detailed here) Presumably generates a complete LaTeX document string from LaTeX code, including necessary preamble and document environment.</li>
  <li><strong>latex_to_svg</strong>: (not detailed here) Converts LaTeX code into an SVG image, facilitating high-quality rendering of mathematical expressions.</li>
  <li><strong>full_tex_to_svg</strong>: (not detailed here) Likely combines full LaTeX document generation with SVG conversion for comprehensive LaTeX rendering.</li>
</ul>
